title: Electrode plates and electrochemical appliance comprising the electrode plates

events.title: Application filed by Ningde Amperex Technology Ltd

classifications.description: Electrodes based on mixed oxides or hydroxides, or on mixtures of oxides or hydroxides, e.g. LiCoOx
Electrodes for accumulators with non-aqueous electrolyte, e.g. for lithium-accumulators; Processes of manufacture thereof
Rocking-chair batteries, i.e. batteries with lithium insertion or intercalation in both electrodes; Lithium-ion batteries
Electrodes based on carbonaceous material, e.g. graphite-intercalation compounds or CFx
Electrodes based on metals, Si or alloys
Selection of substances as active materials, active masses, active liquids
Silicon or alloys based on silicon

Selection of substances as active materials, active masses, active liquids of inorganic oxides or hydroxides of nickel, cobalt or iron of mixed oxides or hydroxides containing iron, cobalt or nickel for inserting or intercalating light metals, e.g. LiNiO2, LiCoO2 or LiCoOxFy
Carbonaceous material, e.g. graphite-intercalation compounds or CFx
Carbonaceous material, e.g. graphite-intercalation compounds or CFx for inserting or intercalating light metals
Physical characteristics, e.g. porosity, surface area

abstract: The present application relates to electrode pads and electrochemical devices including the electrode pads. The anode electrode sheet described in this application includes an anode first region and an anode second region, wherein the DC resistance value R A2 of the anode second region is less than or equal to 98% of the DC resistance value R A1 of the anode first region . The cathode electrode piece described in this application includes a cathode first region and a cathode second region, wherein the DC resistance value R C2 of the cathode second region is greater than the DC resistance value R C1 of the cathode first region. When the anode electrode sheet and/or the cathode electrode sheet described in the present application is applied to an electrochemical device, the formation of lithium dendrites can be effectively reduced, and the safety of the electrochemical device can be improved.
abstract_original: 本申请涉及电极极片和包含所述电极极片的电化学装置。本申请所述的阳极极片包括阳极第一区和阳极第二区，其中所述阳极第二区的直流阻抗值RA2小于或等于所述阳极第一区的直流阻抗值RA1的98％。本申请所述的阴极极片包括阴极第一区和阴极第二区，其中所述阴极第二区的直流阻抗值RC2大于所述阴极第一区的直流阻抗值RC1。当将本申请所述的阳极极片和/或阴极极片应用于电化学装置时，能够有效地降低锂枝晶的形成，改善电化学装置的安全性。
claims:
1.一种阳极极片，其包括阳极第一区和阳极第二区，1. An anode plate comprising an anode first region and an anode second region,
      
      
         其中所述阳极极片包括阳极基材和在所述阳极基材的至少一个表面上的阳极活性物质；且wherein the anode sheet includes an anode substrate and an anode active material on at least one surface of the anode substrate; and
      
      
         其中所述阳极第二区的直流阻抗值RA2小于或等于所述阳极第一区的直流阻抗值RA1的98％。The DC resistance value R A2 of the second anode region is less than or equal to 98% of the DC resistance value R A1 of the anode first region.
2.根据权利要求1所述的阳极极片，其中所述阳极第一区包括阳极主体区，所述阳极第二区包括阳极边缘区。2. The anode sheet of claim 1, wherein the anode first region includes an anode body region and the anode second region includes an anode edge region.

3.根据权利要求1所述的阳极极片，其中所述阳极第二区的阳极极片的厚度小于所述阳极第一区的阳极极片的厚度。3. The anode sheet of claim 1, wherein the thickness of the anode sheet in the second region of the anode is less than the thickness of the anode sheet in the first region of the anode.

4.根据权利要求1所述的阳极极片，其中所述阳极第一区的阳极活性物质的中值粒径Dv50大于所述阳极第二区的阳极活性物质的Dv50。4. The anode sheet according to claim 1, wherein the median particle size Dv50 of the anode active material in the first region of the anode is greater than the Dv50 of the anode active material in the second region of the anode.

5.根据权利要求1所述的阳极极片，其中所述阳极第一区的阳极活性物质包括石墨，且其中所述阳极第二区的阳极活性物质包括硬碳。5. The anode sheet of claim 1, wherein the anode active material of the anode first region comprises graphite, and wherein the anode active material of the anode second region comprises hard carbon.

6.根据权利要求1所述的阳极极片，其中所述阳极第一区的阳极活性物质包括Si，且其中所述阳极第二区的阳极活性物质包括石墨和硬碳的混合物。6. The anode sheet of claim 1, wherein the anode active material of the anode first region comprises Si, and wherein the anode active material of the anode second region comprises a mixture of graphite and hard carbon.

7.根据权利要求1所述的阳极极片，其中所述阳极极片还包括导电碳，且其中所述阳极第一区中的导电碳含量小于所述阳极第二区中的导电碳含量。7. The anode sheet of claim 1, wherein the anode sheet further comprises conductive carbon, and wherein the conductive carbon content in the anode first region is less than the conductive carbon content in the anode second region.

8.根据权利要求1所述的阳极极片，其中所述阳极第一区的基材的导电性差于所述阳极第二区的基材的导电性。8. The anode sheet of claim 1, wherein the conductivity of the substrate in the first region of the anode is less conductive than the conductivity of the substrate in the second region of the anode.

9.根据权利要求1所述的阳极极片，其中所述阳极第一区的基材包括在其表面上涂敷的底涂层，其中所述阳极第一区的底涂层的导电性差于所述阳极第二区的底涂层的导电性。9. The anode sheet of claim 1, wherein the substrate of the anode first region comprises a primer coating applied on its surface, wherein the conductivity of the primer coating of the anode first region is less than The conductivity of the primer layer of the second region of the anode.

10.根据权利要求1所述的阳极极片，其还包括阳极第三区，10. The anode sheet of claim 1, further comprising an anode third region,
      
      
         其中所述阳极第三区的直流阻抗值RA3小于或等于所述阳极第二区的直流阻抗值RA2。The DC resistance value R A3 of the third anode region is less than or equal to the DC resistance value R A2 of the anode second region.

11.根据权利要求1所述的阳极极片，其还包括阳极第四区，11. The anode sheet of claim 1, further comprising an anode fourth region,
      
      
         其中所述阳极第四区包括绝缘材料。Wherein the anode fourth region includes insulating material.

13.根据权利要求12所述的阴极极片，其中所述阴极第一区包括阴极主体区，所述阴极第二区包括阴极边缘区。13. The cathode electrode sheet of claim 12, wherein the cathode first region includes a cathode body region and the cathode second region includes a cathode edge region.

14.根据权利要求12所述的阴极极片，其中所述阴极第二区的阴极极片的厚度小于所述阴极第一区的阴极极片的厚度。14. The cathode sheet of claim 12, wherein the thickness of the cathode sheet in the second region of the cathode is less than the thickness of the cathode sheet in the first region of the cathode.

15.根据权利要求12所述的阴极极片，其中所述阴极第一区的阴极活性物质包括多晶颗粒，所述阴极第二区的阴极活性物质包括单晶颗粒。15. The cathode electrode sheet of claim 12, wherein the cathode active material in the first region of the cathode comprises polycrystalline particles and the cathode active material in the second region of the cathode comprises monocrystalline particles.
16.根据权利要求14所述的阴极极片，其中所述阴极活性物质包括三元材料。16. The cathode sheet of claim 14, wherein the cathode active material comprises a ternary material.

17.根据权利要求12所述的阴极极片，其中所述阴极第一区的阴极活性物质的Dv50小于所述阴极第二区的阴极活性物质的Dv50。17. The cathode sheet of claim 12, wherein the Dv50 of the cathode active material in the first region of the cathode is less than the Dv50 of the cathode active material in the second region of the cathode.

18.根据权利要求12所述的阴极极片，其中所述阴极活性物质包括经碳包覆的活性物质，其中所述阴极第一区的活性物质的碳包覆量大于所述阴极第二区的活性物质的碳包覆量。18. The cathode electrode sheet of claim 12, wherein the cathode active material comprises a carbon-coated active material, wherein the active material in the first region of the cathode has a greater amount of carbon coating than the second region of the cathode The amount of carbon coating of the active material.

19.根据权利要求12所述的阴极极片，其中所述阴极第一区的阴极活性物质包括三元材料，且其中所述阴极第二区的阴极活性物质包括钴酸锂。19. The cathode electrode sheet of claim 12, wherein the cathode active material of the cathode first region comprises a ternary material, and wherein the cathode active material of the cathode second region comprises lithium cobaltate.

20.根据权利要求12所述的阴极极片，其中所述阴极材料还包括导电碳，且其中所述阴极第一区中的阴极材料中的导电碳含量大于所述阴极第二区中的阴极材料中的导电碳含量。20. The cathode electrode sheet of claim 12, wherein the cathode material further comprises conductive carbon, and wherein the cathode material in the first region of the cathode has a greater amount of conductive carbon than the cathode in the second region of the cathode Conductive carbon content in the material.

21.根据权利要求12所述的阴极极片，其中所述阴极第一区的基材的导电性优于所述阴极第二区的基材的导电性。21. The cathode electrode sheet of claim 12, wherein the conductivity of the substrate of the cathode first region is greater than the conductivity of the substrate of the cathode second region.

22.根据权利要求12所述的阴极极片，其还包括阴极第三区，22. The cathode electrode sheet of claim 12, further comprising a cathode third region,
      
      
         其中所述阴极第三区的直流阻抗值RC3大于或等于所述阴极第二区的直流阻抗值RC2。The DC resistance value R C3 of the third region of the cathode is greater than or equal to the DC resistance value R C2 of the second region of the cathode.

23.根据权利要求12所述的阴极极片，其还包括阴极第四区，23. The cathode pole piece of claim 12, further comprising a cathode fourth region,
      
      
         其中所述阴极第四区包括绝缘材料。Wherein the cathode fourth region includes insulating material.

25.根据权利要求24所述的电芯，其中所述阳极极片为权利要求1-9中的任一者所述阳极极片和/或所述阴极极片为权利要求12-21中的任一者所述的阴极极片。25. The cell according to claim 24, wherein the anode electrode sheet is the anode electrode sheet and/or the cathode electrode sheet of any one of claims 1-9. The cathode electrode sheet of any one.

26.根据权利要求24所述的电芯，其中所述阳极极片还包括阳极第三区和/或阳极第四区，26. The cell according to claim 24, wherein the anode electrode sheet further comprises an anode third region and/or an anode fourth region,
      
      
         其中所述阳极第三区的直流阻抗值RA3小于或等于所述阳极第二区的直流阻抗值RA2，Wherein the DC resistance value R A3 of the third anode region is less than or equal to the DC resistance value R A2 of the anode second region,
      
      
         其中所述阳极第四区包括绝缘材料。Wherein the anode fourth region includes insulating material.

27.根据权利要求24所述的电芯，其中所述阴极极片还包括阴极第三区和/或阴极第四区，27. The cell according to claim 24, wherein the cathode electrode sheet further comprises a cathode third region and/or a cathode fourth region,
      
      
         其中所述阴极第三区的直流阻抗值RC3大于或等于所述阴极第二区的直流阻抗值RC2，Wherein the DC resistance value R C3 of the third cathode region is greater than or equal to the DC resistance value R C2 of the second cathode region,
      
      
         其中所述阴极第四区包括绝缘材料。Wherein the cathode fourth region includes insulating material.
